conbody.p:
Recommendations for model's project stored in an SVN repository:
It is highly recommended to work with the Eclipse SVN plug-ins in Design Studio.
All of the model's file mime type must be set to application/octet-stream (i.e., binary). This prevents SVN from trying to merge the model's file, which will corrupt them.
Some of *.vrpackage files found under the rules folder are automatically created locally when a new domain model, dataset or rule is created in the models project. These generated files have to be committed in SVN once. Further conflicts on such files can be ignored.
*.vrpackage files present in the internal folder are completely re-created locally each time a clean project is run on the project model. These files never require SVN commit.
It is recommended to ask your administrator to set svn:ignore property on the folder [project Name]\rule\rules\rules_[Number]\internal-
